channel.title: Patch selection via midi what am I overlooking?
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I am quite sure I am overlooking something really elementary, but I can't figure out why my midi patch selector is not behaving the way I expect it to behave. I have copied and modded some effects from the community library and as a test I am now trying to use two notes on a midi keyboard to switch patches on the axo.
Again, it is probably something very obvious but I can't figure it out...
EDIT: please ignore I figured it out and yes it was super basic level stuff :blush:

item.title: Patch selection via midi what am I overlooking?
item.dc:creator: @MC_DETH
item.description:
@MC_DETH wrote:

Well in short, I made a patch that lets you use two notes on your Midi device to cycle through a selection of effects in a patchbank. What I did not think of was that you need to include this patch as a subpatch in every patch in the patchbank otherwise you are only able to choose the first effect. I can elaborate when I am at my studio again, now that I figured it out it seems so obvious I can't see how I overlooked it in the first place

Read full topic
item.source: Patch selection via midi what am I overlooking?

item.title: Patch selection via midi what am I overlooking?
item.dc:creator: @Yot
item.description:
@Yot wrote:

Hey,

Do you think you can share your experience?
We're glad to know you figured this out but I would love to make it works even if it's super basic. ;o)

Thanks a lot
